title: waila装了他的其他附属之后，会因光暗程度显示不出
author: EtCreeper
txt_content: 如题    装了WailaAddonBC-1.0.5.1  WAILA-features-1.7.10-0.1.0 WailaEvents-1.0.0 Waila-Inhibitors-1.1.0 waila-blacklist-1.7.10-0.1 Wawla-1.3.3-1.7.10 WailaHarvestability-mc1.7.10-1.1.6 Waila-1.5.10_1.7.10

replies.author: MC天佑
replies.txt_content: 你看下这个整合包，这个整合包比较稳定http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... ;page=1#pid10718810
